#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Features =

<a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/28867301@N02/4311250826/" title="Features by soundflowermakesnoise., on Flickr"><img src="http://farm5.static.flickr.com/4044/4311250826_fbd6521d04.jpg" width="500" height="445" alt="Features" /></a>

 * 8 Emulator Devices(monome64 ,128 or 256)
 * 6 Lanchpads
 * Multi Color Device
 * AutoConfigration
 * AutoFocus

About AutoConfigration:<br>
 * http://docs.monome.org/doku.php?id=app:autoconfig
 * http://www.loop-party.com/

= Installation =

PC only
Install Bonjour service on your machine. Download: http://support.apple.com/downloads/Bonjour_for_Windows

= Settings =

<a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/28867301@N02/4310521271/" title="Settings by soundflowermakesnoise., on Flickr"><img src="http://farm5.static.flickr.com/4047/4310521271_8c51a48acd.jpg" width="500" height="165" alt="Settings" /></a>

====1. Launchpad initialization====

====2. Change Emulator View====
 * If you change emulator from launchpad, you can also use the right menu buttons(vol, pan, sndA, sndB, stop, trkOn, solo and arm).

====3. LED View====
 * monome64 has 1 view.
 * monome128 has 2 view.
 * monome256 has 4view.
* If you change emulator from launchpad, you can also use the top menu buttons(learn, view, 'page<' and 'page>').

====4. Emulator Configs====
 * Change Emulator Device Type and LED Colors.
 * Sub color is only used on MultiColorDevice.

====5. OSC Connection(Use autoconfig, autofocus or manual)====
 * when you use manual connection please setup host port, receive port and osc prefix.


= OSC Protocols =
||/press||
||/led||
||/led_row||
||/led_col||
||/frame||
||/clear||
||/sys/prefix||
